plugin.name: dynamic-themes
plugin.author: Garcia Jaubert, Gonzalo
plugin.title: DynamicThemes Plugin
plugin.description: The DynamicThemes plugin allows your Grails application to load externals gsp and css dinamically. It allow you to use a theme folder in any folder and render it. You can process variables and secctions in your gsp. See DynamicThemesTest (https://github.com/gonzalogarciajaubert/DynamicThemesTest)application for examples.
